product_name: Easton EA90 XD Road Wheel - Front
long_description: Designed from the ground up for cyclocross racing, the Easton EA90 XD Front Wheel offers excellent durability and disc-brake compatibility for your road bike. It weighs in at a light 729g.
short_description: Designed from the ground up for cyclocross racing, the Easton EA90 XD Front Wheel offers excellent durability and disc-brake compatibility for your road bike. It weighs in at a light 729g.
